title: Drawing, 19th century
medium: Brush and gouache on pre-printed squared laid paper
markings: Verso, stamp in red ink: AUSTRIA
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper right: 309.; lower left: bei M. Levy in Berlin.
dimensions:
Sheet: 23.6 x 17.9 cm (9 5/16 x 7 1/16 in.)
Platemark: 20.3 x 15.7 cm (8 in. x 6 3/16 in.)
description: At center, a violet shell-like cornucopia filled with flowers in orange, white, blue, red, purple, and yellow; below, a blue short footed vase with flowers in pink, orange, blue, and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 19th century.
19th century. Brush and gouache on pre-printed squared laid paper. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-71-28.
